trans-unit.source: Translates colors to and from GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 将颜色与其他 GDI + 转换<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Translates an HTML color representation to a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将转换为 GDI + 的 HTML 颜色表示<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method translates a string representation of an HTML color name, such as Blue or Red, to a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换的字符串表示形式的 HTML 颜色名称，如蓝色或红色，为 GDI +<xref:System.Drawing.Color>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the Html color to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 Html 颜色的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The structure that represents the translated HTML color or if htmlColor is .
trans-unit.target: 结构，它表示已翻译的 HTML 颜色或如果 htmlColor 是 。

trans-unit.source: htmlColor is not a valid HTML color name.
trans-unit.target: htmlColor不是有效的 HTML 颜色名称。

trans-unit.source: Translates an OLE color value to a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将转换为 GDI + 的 OLE 颜色值<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The OLE color to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 OLE 颜色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the translated OLE color.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构，它表示已翻译的 OLE 颜色。

trans-unit.source: Translates a Windows color value to a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Windows 颜色将值转换为 GDI + <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The Windows color to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 Windows 颜色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the translated Windows color.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构，它表示已翻译的 Windows 颜色。

trans-unit.source: Translates the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to an HTML string color representation.
trans-unit.target: 将指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>为 HTML 字符串颜色表示形式的结构。

trans-unit.source: This method translates a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structure to a string representation of an HTML color.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换<xref:System.Drawing.Color>为 HTML 颜色的字符串表示形式的结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: This is the commonly used name of a color, such as "Red", "Blue", or "Green", and not string representation of a numeric color value, such as "FF33AA".
trans-unit.target: 这是常用的一种颜色，如"Red"、"Blue"或"绿色"、 名称和非字符串表示形式的数字的颜色值，如"FF33AA"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to translate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构转换。

trans-unit.source: The string that represents the HTML color.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HTML 颜色的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Translates the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to an OLE color.
trans-unit.target: 将指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>为 OLE 颜色的结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to translate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构转换。

trans-unit.source: The OLE color value.
trans-unit.target: OLE 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Translates the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to a Windows color.
trans-unit.target: 将指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> Windows 颜色的结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure to translate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>结构转换。

trans-unit.source: The Windows color value.
trans-unit.target: Windows 颜色值。
